ygData.subject: Re: LVL10 GATE SPELL USE
ygData.msgSnippet: The way I use gate is SHADOWSTEP, THEN GATE .. . SS is much faster casting time and if you are in melee forget it .. . also when solo .. .  ROOT (hope it
ygData.messageBody:
The way I use gate is SHADOWSTEP, THEN GATE .. .

SS is much faster casting time and if you are in melee forget it .. .

also when solo .. . ROOT (hope it doesn't resist) then BLAST IT!
if it resists ROOT, SS, GATE hehe

-Mata 10th High Elf (ECI)
----- Original Message -----

> From: "Jan Sterken" <jsterken@...>
I almost never can get my
> gate spell off in time to get out of trouble. I do not want to resort to
> Kill Stealing (this is very easy for a wizard)
>
> Does anyone have advice on how to advance faster. And combinations of
spells...
